about_the_game:
Add even more dialogue with Vol 4 of the very popular Japanese Anime Voices: Female Character Series. Vol 4 will give them even more additional extras they need to expand their dialogue abilities and better tell their stories! Picking up where Vol 3 left off, this pack offers more common, everyday phrases useful for game dialog. Go ahead and give your female players even more things to talk about and make the tories richer and richer!

Features:

* 126 Japanese animation-like female voices (phrases) for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Female voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPGs and much more!
* English translation file included
* For use in Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
